item.title: Why Evolution Will Work Against Interstellar Civilizations
item.description: E.T. may be as risk averse and hamstrung by short-term thinking as we humans, says evolutionary anthropologist.

item.title: “One Health” Is The New Global Policy Framework
item.description: The Lancet’s One Health Commission urges leaders to link human, animal, and environmental health as central to global policy and business strategy.
